Content for CWE ID: 398

Checkmarx Rule

QueryId : 519
Cwe : 398
IsExecutable : true
IsEncrypted : false
Severity : 0
PackageId : 31
Status : Original
Type : Regular

Source

 CxList fileds = Find_Field_Decl() + All.FindByType(typeof(ConstantDecl));

CxList StaticLoggers = fileds.FindByFieldAttributes(Modifiers.Static).FindByType("Logger");

CxList allLoggers = fileds.FindByType("Logger");

result = allLoggers - StaticLoggers;
